name: proyecto-cypress---fiorella-adduci
description: Proyecto Final de Curso de Cypress

scripts.cypress:open:mobile:test: npx cypress open -c viewportWidth=375,viewportHeight=667,userAgent="Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 10_3_1 like Mac OS X)" -e baseUrl=https://automationteststore.com/
scripts.cypress:run:regression:mobile:test: npx cypress run -c viewportWidth=375,viewportHeight=667,userAgent="Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 10_3_1 like Mac OS X)" -e baseUrl=https://automationteststore.com/,grepTags=@regression -s cypress/integration/*.spec.js

author: UBP
